    Customize Jekyll Layouts Theme

    Customize Layouts Theme If you’d like to change the theme’s HTML layout: Copy the original template from the theme’s repository (Pro-tip: click “raw” to make copying easier) Create a file called /_layouts/default.html in your site Paste the default layout content copied in the first step Customize the layout as you’d like
